programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: The Legends travel to the winter of 1776 to protect George Washington during the American Revolution, but Sara is forced to send out Nate and Amaya when things don't go as planned.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons - EP 4
programme.desc: Every year, spectacular seasons transform our planet. Spring brings new life, but it's also a dash to wake up and get ahead of everyone else. Summer is a time of long days and glorious abundance. But the living isn't always easy when the temperatures rise. Autumn brings the world's most spectacular transformations. It's also the last chance to breed, to grow up, to stock up before the cold returns. During winter - the most magical, dramatic season of all - animals find inventive ways to survive.

programme.title: Eat The Week - EP 5
programme.desc: Coming to the rescue of 10 families who are facing universal culinary conundrums - whether that's eating the same old dishes every week, feeding fussy eaters or being short on time - Simon has the answer. Featuring inspiring recipes that are quick and simple to follow, stunning food photography and fascinating foodie stories with reporter and cook Michela Chiappa - Eat The Week is the delicious feel good food show for all the family.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 27
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Nicole Kidman, Charlize Theron and Margot Robbie ("Bombshell"). Midland perform their new hit, "Mr. Lonely," from their CD, "Let It Roll".

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is A. The superheroes are on a mission to rescue an Astronaut. Learn more words starting with the letter A as they go along!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 6
programme.desc: While playing in the garden, Leo and Hero stumble upon a reticulated python and its eggs. The Junior Rangers drive to the rainforest to find a suitable home for the python, but an aggressive hippo makes the task a lot more difficult. Katie identifies a large-beaked bird in the garden as an Australian pelican. The Junior Rangers bring the pelican to a lake and track down the pelican's parents.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 48
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 33
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 34
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Transformers Cyberverse - EP 13
programme.desc: When Bumblebee can't remember what his current mission on Earth is, Windblade repairs his memory chips, enabling him to rediscover his past adventures on Cybertron. When his memories are being repaired, Bumblebee gets a clue that will lead both him and Windblade to complete their mission and save their friends, unaware that a team of Decepticons are tracking them too!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks reside on Seaside Island in Hedgehog Village. Together, they defend the island from various threats like Doctor Eggman and his robotic creation.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: He is big as a bear, strong as a bear, smart... as a bear. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest his bears privilege. That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - the lemmings.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 4
programme.desc: The Turtles face Shredder's new deadly assassin and uncover a new Kraang plot. They'll also encounter more mutants, discover more about the mysterious Kraang species, and venture into new realms.

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime to solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and get stuck in his game forever!

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 10
programme.desc: Much as the Swiss love their fondue, the Chinese are passionate about hot pot; or more commonly known as steamboat by Singaporeans. We travel to hot pot city Chengdu, the birth place of the spicy hot pot. Food Notes find out why people here eat spicy hot pot even during the hot summer months.

programme.title: Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra At The Musikverein

programme.title: Totally Totto - EP 2

programme.desc: Peter Parker's relaxing European vacation takes an unexpected turn when Nick Fury shows up in his hotel room to recruit him for a mission. The world is in danger as four massive elemental creatures -- each representing Earth, air, water and fire -- emerge from a hole torn in the universe. Parker soon finds himself donning the Spider-Man suit to help Fury and fellow superhero Mysterio stop the evil entities from wreaking havoc across the continent.

programme.title: Attenborough And The Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest-known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long - close to four London buses put end to end - and weighing 70 metric tons, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth. Filmed over the next two years, the documentary follows the twists and turns of this forensic investigation.

programme.title: 笑傲江湖 The Legendary Swordsman - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Based on Louis Cha's classic swordplay novel, this lavish production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jing Tao as a legendary swordsman and TCS top actress Fann Wong as his love interest. programme.title: 星期二特写-- 极限人生 Tuesday Report - No Limit - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Singapore men's national ice hockey team failed to clinch a medal in the 2017 SEA Games. Disappointed and defeated, several players chose to exit the lackluster national team. (重)2017年的东运会，怀着赢取奖牌目标的新加坡国家男子冰上曲棍球队，空手而归；数名球员对赛果失望、对未来茫然，选择退队。为了国家荣誉，球员陈嘉驹和蓝德俊，重新组建团队，誓要在2019年的东运会，再次冲击奖牌。.

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Happily attached Felicia Chin visits Steven's family of 7 to learn more about marriage and parenthood. Upon learning that Steven & Lai Fong's 17th wedding anniversary is nearing, Felicia brings the children out for floral arrangement and baking lessons to surprise their parents on their special day. (重)双薪夫妻张志文和符莱凤育有5个孩子。来自小家庭的陈凤玲，探访了他们一家7口，深入了解他们的生活，也亲自感受大家庭所带来的喜悦与满足感。陈凤玲也首次体验当保姆，带着小朋友们出游、上插花课和烘焙课。在陈凤玲的安排下，5个孩子分工合作，为父母精心策划他们结婚17周年的惊喜派对。.

programme.title: 星光灿烂 The Glittering Days - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Xu Wen Hui is a popular singer who was forced to take part in all sorts of singing competition by her adopted father, Jin Long. He treats Wen Hui like a money making machine. She became withdrawn and temperamental. By her own talents, Wen Hui became a very established singer but it did not last long (PG)(重)徐雯蕙是一个当红流行曲女歌手，自小被养父蔡金龙捧成童星歌手并视为摇钱树，导致雯蕙的童年过得极不愉快，性格亦变得孤僻，甚至有点愤世嫉俗。雯蕙成年后当上了唱片歌手，就在推介新唱片的那天，传媒大肆报导她与有妇之夫交往的绯闻，导致雯蕙知名度受损，唱片公司也跟她解约。金龙因欠下债务无力偿还，逼雯蕙投靠亲生母亲苏小小，因而揭发了雯蕙是苏小小的女儿的秘密，让雯蕙震惊不已。.

(PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)可恩和宏哲以星星灯为蓝图，设计月亮灯参加比赛。陈健故意告诉可恩，星星灯是宏哲特地为淑慧设计的，他特别珍惜，多少钱都不卖，而月亮灯只是个毫无价值的山寨版。可恩无法接受，她悄悄来到工作室，发狂似地把月亮灯饰捣毁。.

Xiuzhu confesses to the sleeping Shuhui that she regrets the past, and promises not to leave her again. The next day, Xiuzhu becomes dizzy and falls. Her nose starts to bleed. (PG)(重)宏哲决定与淑慧办分居手续，淑慧难以置信。秀珠得知此事，跑到齐家大闹，责问宏哲。宏哲当面说出他和淑慧已经无法回到从前，所以不想再拖拖拉拉浪费时间，秀珠震怒不已。.

programme.title: 愿者上钩 CyberPunk'D - EP 2
programme.desc: The "Internet of things" has empowered us, and even enriched our lives. But it's also made us more vulnerable to hacks. Comedian Fakkah Fuzz discovers how to get smart when using smart devices. 法卡法兹的网络安全之旅已经展开。密码、加密，甚至是网络钓鱼，这些名词对他不再陌生。不过，这样就可以保障在网络上的安全吗？ 你知不知道，勒索软件是存在的！温度调节器可以被用来进行要挟。除非你把赎金交给勒索者，否则你根本开不了冷气或暖气。 会说话、进行互动的娃娃，也可以因为蓝牙连接没有加密，而让心术不正的人，通过麦克风和孩子说话。 互联网上的世界似乎危机四伏，听起来是不是很恐怖！ 其实一点也不！只要勇于面对，加强对互联网的认识，就能尽本分做好防守员，因为在这个互联网的世界里，只有《愿者上钩》。.

programme.title: 我的小小美猴王 My Little Monkey King - EP 34

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Shanmei asks Anna out, pretends to be disappointed in her family and intends to divorce Yaozong. She tells Anna that she will not stop Anna from stealing the coin and that she knows where Yaozong hid the coin. Anna goes to the place that Shanmei told her the coin was hidden but this was all part of Shanmei's plan to reveal Anna's true intentions. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)善美约安娜出来，假装自己对赵家失望，要跟耀宗离婚，不会再阻止安娜去夺取钱币，透露她知道耀宗把钱币藏在哪里。安娜到善美所说的地方找钱币，没想到这却是善美设下的计谋，目的是让安娜露出真面目。.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Yuanling has a fight with the 5th Prince, Yuanxi, ends up being framed for Yuanxi's death. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)元凌与五皇子元汐刀剑相抵，不料却有人暗中出手取了元汐性命而元凌就诬陷是杀害元汐的凶手。卿尘浅入碧血阁查明真相却被关押了起来而在牢仓中见到师姐冥魇。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 367
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) With the encouragement of Yan Xun, Jia Ying decides to confess to Wei Ren. However, Jia Ying catches Wei Ren off guard and Wei Ren does not know how to react to the confession. He quickly finds an excuse to leave the place. Jia Ying is disappointed. Wei Ren is worried for leaving Jia Ying behind, hence, he calls 'Ji Dan Zai' to accompany her. Jia Ying is unable to tolerate 'Ji Dan Zai's pester and vents all her anger on him. (PG)(重)嘉颖在彦勋的鼓励下，决定向为人告白。为人始料不及，一时间不知如何应对，只好找借口开溜，嘉颖感失望。为人放心不下嘉颖，通知鸡蛋仔来找她。嘉颖受不了鸡蛋仔的死缠烂打，把闷气发泄在他身上。.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 10

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 2
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 台湾各地好吃的肉在哪里？让詹姆士带大家去品尝。台南有名的温体牛肉吸引了各地老饕争先排队抢食。为了了解嘉义鸡肉饭好吃的秘诀，詹姆士还特地去到嘉义的火鸡养殖场，意外品尝到了这些专家们的私房拿手菜，好吃的程度让詹姆士大吃一惊！.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 6
programme.desc: Xie Ying found out that her boyfriend, Justin, has a new lover and threatens to commit suicide. Fortunately, she was saved. Xie Ying pours her heart out to Mandy who feels sorry for her. Mandy, who has never approved of Justin, decides to make Justin and Celine embarrassed in front of their classmates at Justin's birthday party, which Celine had planned, in order to help her daughter. (PG)谢颖发现男友Justin移情别恋，与Celine在一起而闹自杀，幸好被救回。谢颖向Mandy哭诉，Mandy感到心疼。她原本就不看好Justin，于是趁机在Celine为Justin办的生日会上捉弄两人，让他们在许多同学面前出糗，帮女儿出气。.

programme.title: 罪案心理小组X Visible Lies - EP 14
programme.desc: Xu Lang deduces that Tang Tianli had an affair when he was alive and hotel staff Bai Xiaoping was his mistress. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)徐朗推断唐天里生前有婚外情，而在酒店上班的白小萍就是他的情人。白小萍承认是唐天里的情人，长期受他虐待，在忍无可忍的情况下才对唐天里下毒手。虽然白小萍承认干案，但徐朗认为白小萍是被人教唆的。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 24

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 47

Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.desc: (R) Boris decides to pursue Ke Ai as he feels that Shun Shui does not deserve her. Ke Ai defends Shun Shui, but Boris is determined to challenge him. (PG)(重)Boris决定把可爱从顺水手中抢过来，因为他觉得顺水没资格当可爱的男朋友。可爱帮顺水解释，Boris却坚决要挑战顺水。另一方面，顺水觉得Boris是在可爱面前演戏充好人，可爱觉得顺水这样批评Boris很过分，生气离开。.

programme.desc: (R) Jurong is not only an industrial area, but also a historical landmark with exciting developments! Besides the adventourous Science Center, there is also a 75 year old Dragon Kiln! Come along with our hosts and explore undiscovered secrets of Jurong! (重)在大家的认知中，裕廊是个“工业区”，但其实它也是一个历史丰富，多姿多彩的地区！除了有一间让小朋友学习各种科学知识的科学馆，还有一座已经有75年的龙窑！这一集，跟随两位搜密组员，探索裕廊地区有趣的人、事、物！.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Anna kidnaps Chenglong and Yaozong asks Shanmei to use the coin to save him. Shanmei is put in a dilemma as Yaozong will die if she uses the third wishing coin. Will Yaozong be able to save Chenglong? What will his predicament be? (PG)(重)(大结局)安娜绑架了成龙，耀宗要善美拿钱币出来解救。善美矛盾，说出要是用了第三枚愿望钱币，耀宗就会死。耀宗决定牺牲，他夜晚翻找钱币，终于被他找到。他留下东西给善美，偷偷看了家人后便离开。耀宗能救出成龙吗？他的下场会如何？.

programme.title: 小偏方大拆解 Health Hacks - EP 9
programme.desc: The environmental influence in this modern society has resulted in a decline in the visual functions of many people. There are many folk remedies to treat and relieve various common eye problems. This episode, let's hear from the experts on the credibility and effectiveness of these folk remedies. 现代社会，人们由于受到环境的影响，导致视力功能减退，各种眼科疾病普遍常见，因此在坊间流传着不少针对治疗、缓解眼睛问题的偏方。在这一集的节目里，让专家来告诉我们哪些偏方有效，哪些却不可信。.

programme.title: 心。愿 The Wish - EP 1
programme.desc: A motorbike accident robbed aircraft engineer Tan Hong Lian of his mobility, but not his spirit. Now in a nursing home, he finds solace in gardening and grooming its plants. programme.title: Kawanku... Oh Yeah! - EP 3
programme.desc: Hakimi suggests to Ryan to be performing together for Teacher's Day concert. Ryans mother opposes it as she who wants Ryan to fully concentrate on his preparation for PSLE. Nevertheless, Ryan goes ahead with the idea despite Hakimis objection for fear that Ryans mother would be angry at them.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat - EP 2
programme.desc: The doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT with the panel of experts and celebrity discuss on the topic of heart attack. What are the early signs of an attack and what can trigger it? A medical expert shares on what actually happen during a heart attack. And a first aid tip on the basic actions that one can take when there is a nearby attack.

programme.title: Empat Penjuru - EP 2
programme.desc: Along gets into an argument with Uda during preparations for the gathering. He is frustrated when Uda does not respect him as her oldest brother. Salmah witnesses the tension between them and persuades Along to calm down. Later, she finds out that Uda has lied to her about her mother-in-law admitted in the hospital in order to leave for home earlier than planned.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 18
programme.desc: Ain gets a scolding from Cikgu Siti when she tries to advise her not to be so hard on Reyza. Wahida helps Salehin set up a date with Ain. He then decides to confess to Ain that he likes her a lot not knowing she is already married.

programme.title: Papa Sayang
programme.desc: A romantic love comedy that revolves between Yusuf and Mila who fell in love at first sight. Yusuf was in love with Mila because of her love of the Kebaya. This however has made Yusuf head over heels about her. Knowing that Yusuf has his eyes on her, Mila decided to change her style to a more modern look to attract and impress him.But when love was about to bloom, along came Mona, their neighbour, who also has her eye on Yusuf. This made Mila furious and feel that Yusuf has cheated on her.

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 4
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Warna - EP 3
programme.desc: Santai Bersama Warna.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat - EP 2
programme.desc: The doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT with the panel of experts and celebrity discuss on the topic of heart attack. What are the early signs of an attack and what can trigger it? A medical expert shares on what actually happen during a heart attack. And a first aid tip on the basic actions that one can take when there is a nearby attack.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 6
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business.

programme.title: Resipi Rahsia Sr 1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how some traditional dishes are made the authentic way? Resipi Rahsia which translates to Secret Recipe brings viewers to see the authentic way of making traditional and also to learn real traditional tips when creating these wonderful dishes.

programme.desc: Syafie sees a rift forming between Maira and Syafik and it concerns him. Syafik and Fauzie, on the other hand, finds himself busy now that his office manager, Nad, disappears without any news. Meanwhile, Faras attempt to delve into the ELIXR story ends up getting her in big trouble.

programme.title: Vanakkam Singai - EP 15
programme.desc: "Vanakkam Singai" - is an amalgamation of indoor and outdoor segments within one programme to cater to general audience of multiple age groups. Making the transition from radio's weekday morning belt to television, "Vanakkam Singai" is a 1-hour Breakfast show that aims to kick start Sundays morning with a smile. The segments will comprise of quick breakfast demonstrations , lifestyle & wellness, light-hearted discussion topics that all households can relate to.

programme.title: Sachien
programme.desc: A love battle on a college campus between two young students, Sachein and Shalini who try to deny their feelings for each other.

programme.desc: A young man who grew up in a monastery and a tough businesswoman with questionable morals establish a unique relationship.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. The story of Gemini revolves around Gemini (Vikram) and Teja (Kalabhavan Mani), two contemporary rowdies in Chennai. programme.title: Maan Karate
programme.desc: A fortune teller reveals that Peter will win a boxing match and share his winnings with his friends. Eventually, his friends learns that the seer had the right name but the wrong person.

programme.title: Thiruvilayadhal
programme.desc: Muruga leaves for Palani in anger when his elder brother, Vinayaka, wins in a competition arranged by his parents. Will Muruga calm down when he learns about his father's divine games?

programme.title: Control Your Gear
programme.desc: Andrew Cotton talks about the most controllable variable when surfing big waves: the equipment. When chasing huge waves, most of the variables are beyond the surfer's control. Andrew Cotton talks about controlling what he can with his equipment and the safety procedures he uses when he surfs.

programme.title: Tracking Giants
programme.desc: Getting big waves means being in the right place at the right time. Andrew tracks a big swell to Portugal. The science behind tracking waves is a complex process. Andrew Cotton relies on surf forecasters and weather data to predict where and when the biggest swells are hitting. When one heads towards Portugal, he jams to Nazaré to be there when it hits.

programme.title: Dolomites Descent
programme.desc: Go with Richie Schley as he lives a mountain biker's dream by riding the Dolomites from top to bottom. Richie Schley lives a mountain biker's dream by riding Italy's Dolomites from top to bottom. Take the trip with Richie as he tackles the sheer and austere limestone of the peaks and rips through the forests below the tree line in a ride for the ages.

programme.title: Tempo Storm takes a leap of faith
programme.desc: Red Bull cliff diver David Colturi teaches Hearthstone team members to cliff dive. Like cliff diving, the game Hearthstone is all about calculating risk. Watch as Red Bull cliff diver David Colturi teaches Hearthstone’s Tempo Storm team members Frodan and Reynad to face their nerves and perform a cliff dive.

programme.title: Snake Eyez conquers his fears – and the falls
programme.desc: Street Fighter player Snake Eyez learns about watersports from pro kayaker Rafa Ortiz. Top of his game, Street Fighter player Snake Eyez heads out on the river with kayaker Rafa Ortiz and learns the fundamentals of kayaking.

programme.title: Teams with Dreams
programme.desc: Meet five teams preparing for the Baja 1000 and learn what motivates each to enter off-roading's crown jewel. A pro racer, a hometown hero, a husband-and-wife team, a pair of sisters, and a total novice – meet five diverse teams preparing for the Baja 1000. They all have different motivations but only one goal: to try to win off-road racing's crown jewel.

programme.title: Supervention
programme.sub-title: A progressive look at skiing and snowboarding
programme.desc: Follow the world's most talented skiers and snowboarders on an unpredictable trip through exotic destinations. Follow a group of the world's most talented skiers and snowboarders on an intense trip through exotic destinations in Norway, Sweden, Canada, USA and New Zealand. See spectacular nature footage mixed with progressive skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: TJ Rogers
programme.desc: From foster care to a first-class skateboarder, TJ Rogers heads home to retrace his turbulent formative years. Now a world-travelling skateboarder, TJ Rogers didn't always have it so easy. TJ returns to his hometown of Whitby, Canada, to visit the people and places that shaped his life during his troubled and turbulent formative years.

programme.title: Torey Pudwill
programme.desc: Roll along with us as we chill with Grizzly Griptape and Thank You Skateboards' very own Torey Pudwill. Roll along with us as we chill with Grizzly Griptape and Thank You Skateboards' very own Torey Pudwill for a day in Woodland Hills, California.

programme.title: Paying the Price
programme.sub-title: Taking on the world's toughest enduro race
programme.desc: Follow Toby Price’s emotional journey from simple country kid to Australia’s first Dakar Rally champion. Winning the Dakar Rally takes more than strength. Victory demands sacrifice, something Toby Price knows about firsthand. Follow Australia’s first Dakar Rally champion through the trials and tribulations that moulded him into the racer he is today.

programme.title: Planet Jupiter
programme.desc: Skateboarder Zion Wright returns home to Jupiter, Florida, USA, for some family time and competition prep. After winning the Phoenix Am, Red Bull's Zion Wright became a national name in skateboarding. Zion returns home to Jupiter, Florida, United States, to spend time with his family and prep for the upcoming Tampa Am.

programme.title: Tampa Am
programme.desc: Skateboarder Zion Wright is in Tampa, Florida, USA, for the longest-running amateur competition in the world. Skateboarder Zion Wright sets his sights on the Tampa Am, the longest-running amateur competition in the world. A win here will put him well on the road to turning pro. Meanwhile, his friends talk about life with the young ripper.

programme.title: Ocean Blues
programme.desc: GZA, founder member of the hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan, explores the idea of living at the bottom of the ocean. Host GZA wonders whether exploring the depths of our oceans might be the ultimate game changer for life on earth. Watch where this thought takes him as he searches for answers.

programme.title: Global Warming
programme.desc: GZA, the show's host, travels the United States to explore how scientists are trying to solve global warming. Host GZA’s journey to discover how we might out-think global warming takes him from a Harvard RoboBee lab, to an underground park in New York, to the world’s largest hurricane simulator at the University of Miami.

programme.title: Flying on Water
programme.sub-title: Off-Shore Foiling from New York to Bermuda
programme.desc: America's Cup champ Jimmy Spithill and a crew of foiling pros sail an experimental craft across the Atlantic. The worlds of offshore sailing and America’s Cup racing collide in an adventure across the Atlantic. Follow Oracle Team USA skipper Jimmy Spithill and Team Falcon as they 'fly on water' from New York, United States, to Bermuda.

programme.title: Heartbeats to Heaven Episode 1
programme.desc: A crew of pro skateboarders, and film-maker Marcos De Souza, explore the skate scenes of Paraguay. Angelo Caro, Maxim Habanec, Tyler Surrey and Giovanni Vianna explore the skate scenes of Paraguay in the first-ever pro skate tour of this mysterious and exotic nation.

programme.title: Heartbeats to Heaven Episode 2
programme.desc: Angelo Caro, Maxim Habanec, Tyler Surrey and Giovanni Vianna meet Paraguay's skate scenes. Angelo Caro, Maxim Habanec, Tyler Surrey and Giovanni Vianna meet the tiny skate scenes of Paraguay in the first ever pro skate tour of this mysterious and exotic nation.

programme.title: Billabong Pipe Masters
programme.desc: Be a fly on the wall at the Volcom House during Billabong Pipe Masters 2019 in Oahu, Hawaii. Be a fly on the wall at the Billabong Pipe Masters 2019 – get inside the action to hear the conversations, see the preparations and share the excitement.

programme.title: Looking for musical chemistry
programme.desc: S1 E1 – Songwriters get randomly paired up with producers as they work together to create an original track. S1 E1 – Songwriters Nic Da Kid, Lily Kiing and Piers James get randomly paired up with producers Melle Brown, TwoSeven and Tokyo the Producer in this round as they work together to create an original track.

programme.title: 4 Waves 1 Hour
programme.sub-title: The Story of Mick Fanning's 2013 ASP Title
programme.desc: A battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. The 2013 ASP World Championship was a battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning that all came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. Mick's journey to the title is narrated by the man himself in an intimate and dramatic look at his win.
